name: Torch
description: Torch and color backlight help you to highlight the road or check the screen.  Features: * Strobe light. * Turn on/off torch by toggle switch or long press on screen. * Adjusting the brightness of the screen by vertical scroll. * 9 colors in support, colors of rainbow plus white and black (RGB colors are included). * Change the olor of the screen by horizontal scrolling or buttons which are placed in the bottom of the screen. * Full screen mode by double tap.
